description:
The evil trio head to Tokyo in the 38th year of the Meiji period to find the famous writer Natsume Soseki, who wrote classics such as “I Am a Cat,” and “Botchan.” They are greeted by a black cat who leads them to a gentleman with a magnificent moustache. Could it be Natsume Soseki? He apparently is having a hard time coming up with his next title and tells the evil trio that he’ll give them the Dynamond if they can help him with his new work, and that’s when Tokio and Calen show up. Because Soseki loves sweets, they decide to have a sweets battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bungou Natsume Souseki ga Muchuu Datta Bikkuri Dokkuri na Tabemono to wa!?
What Super Surprising Food Was the Great Author Natsume Soseki Obsessed With?!
文豪夏目漱石が夢中だったビックリドッキリな食べ物とは!?
